title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds and 2 purples applied by brush and pen. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist by immersion. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 37 x 51 cm (14 9/16 x 20 1/16 in.)
description: Fragment of a larger panel showing figures in Asian-style dress.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds and 2 purples applied by brush and pen. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist by immersion. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-26.
